00112 void ProceduralClouds::update(Real timeSinceLastFrame)
00113 {
00114         static float runningTime = 0.0f;
00115 
00116         if (runningTime > m_updateInterval)
00117         {
00118                 // Generate some new noise, saving out old noise.
00119                 generateNoise(m_tex_Octave1_cur, m_tex_Octave1_pre);
00120                 generateNoise(m_tex_Octave2_cur, m_tex_Octave2_pre);
00121                 generateNoise(m_tex_Octave3_cur, m_tex_Octave3_pre);
00122                 generateNoise(m_tex_Octave4_cur, m_tex_Octave4_pre);
00123 
00124                 runningTime -= m_updateInterval;
00125         }
00126 
00127         // Noise interpolation (cloud formation animation).
00128         float t = runningTime / m_updateInterval;
00129         if (t < 0.0f)   t = 0.0f;
00130         if (t > 1.0f)   t = 1.0f;
00131 
00132         interpolateNoise(t, m_tex_Octave1_pre, m_tex_Octave1_cur, m_tex_Octave1);
00133         interpolateNoise(t, m_tex_Octave2_pre, m_tex_Octave2_cur, m_tex_Octave2);
00134         interpolateNoise(t, m_tex_Octave3_pre, m_tex_Octave3_cur, m_tex_Octave3);
00135         interpolateNoise(t, m_tex_Octave4_pre, m_tex_Octave4_cur, m_tex_Octave4);
00136 
00137         runningTime += timeSinceLastFrame;
00138 }

00154 void ProceduralClouds::generateNoise(TexturePtr texture, TexturePtr prevTexture)
00155 {
00156         HardwarePixelBufferSharedPtr pb_cur = texture->getBuffer();
00157 
00158         // Lock the pixel buffer and get a pixel box
00159         pb_cur->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD); // For best performance use HBL_DISCARD!
00160         const PixelBox *pixelBox_cur = &pb_cur->getCurrentLock();
00161 
00162         uint8 *pDest_cur = static_cast<uint8*>(pixelBox_cur->data);
00163 
00164         HardwarePixelBufferSharedPtr pb_pre;
00165         const PixelBox *pixelBox_pre;
00166         uint8 *pDest_pre;
00167 
00168         // If we have a previous texture, repeat above steps for it.
00169         if (!prevTexture.isNull())
00170         {
00171                 assert(texture->getWidth() == prevTexture->getWidth() &&
00172                            texture->getHeight() == prevTexture->getHeight());
00173 
00174                 pb_pre = prevTexture->getBuffer();
00175                 pb_pre->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD);
00176                 pixelBox_pre = &pb_pre->getCurrentLock();
00177                 pDest_pre = static_cast<uint8*>(pixelBox_pre->data);
00178         }
00179 
00180         // Fill in pixel data.
00181         for (size_t row = 0; row < texture->getHeight(); ++row)
00182         {
00183                 for(size_t col = 0; col < texture->getWidth(); ++col)
00184                 {
00185                         // Save out current into prev.
00186                         if (!prevTexture.isNull())
00187                         {
00188                                 *pDest_pre++ = *(pDest_cur);
00189                                 *pDest_pre++ = *(pDest_cur + 1);
00190                                 *pDest_pre++ = *(pDest_cur + 2);
00191                                 *pDest_pre++ = *(pDest_cur + 3);
00192                         }
00193 
00194                         // Noise generation.
00195                         float r = (float)rand() / ((float)RAND_MAX+1.0f);
00196                         int rInt = (int)(r * 255.0f);
00197                         assert(rInt >= 0 && rInt <= 255);
00198 
00199                         *pDest_cur++ = rInt; // B
00200                         *pDest_cur++ = rInt; // G
00201                         *pDest_cur++ = rInt; // R
00202                         *pDest_cur++ = 255; // A
00203                 }
00204         }
00205 
00206         // Unlock the pixel buffer.
00207         pb_cur->unlock();
00208 
00209         if (!prevTexture.isNull())
00210                 pb_pre->unlock();
00211 }

00239 void ProceduralClouds::interpolateNoise(float t, Ogre::TexturePtr tex1, Ogre::TexturePtr tex2, Ogre::TexturePtr dest)
00240 {
00241         assert(tex1->getHeight() == tex2->getHeight() && tex2->getHeight() == dest->getHeight() &&
00242                    tex1->getWidth() == tex2->getWidth() && tex2->getWidth() == dest->getWidth());
00243 
00244         HardwarePixelBufferSharedPtr pb = dest->getBuffer();
00245         HardwarePixelBufferSharedPtr pb_pre = tex1->getBuffer();
00246         HardwarePixelBufferSharedPtr pb_cur = tex2->getBuffer();
00247 
00248         // Lock the pixel buffer and get a pixel box
00249         pb->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD); // For best performance use HBL_DISCARD!
00250         const PixelBox *pixelBox = &pb->getCurrentLock();
00251 
00252         pb_pre->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD);
00253         const PixelBox *pixelBox_pre = &pb_pre->getCurrentLock();
00254 
00255         pb_cur->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD);
00256         const PixelBox *pixelBox_cur = &pb_cur->getCurrentLock();
00257 
00258         uint8 *pDest = static_cast<uint8*>(pixelBox->data);
00259         uint8 *pDest_pre = static_cast<uint8*>(pixelBox_pre->data);
00260         uint8 *pDest_cur = static_cast<uint8*>(pixelBox_cur->data);
00261 
00262         for (size_t row = 0; row < dest->getHeight(); ++row)
00263         {
00264                 for(size_t col = 0; col < dest->getWidth(); ++col)
00265                 {
00266                         // Interpolate.
00267                         *pDest++ = (float)*pDest_pre++ * (1.0f - t) + (float)*pDest_cur++ * t;
00268                         *pDest++ = (float)*pDest_pre++ * (1.0f - t) + (float)*pDest_cur++ * t;
00269                         *pDest++ = (float)*pDest_pre++ * (1.0f - t) + (float)*pDest_cur++ * t;
00270                         *pDest++ = (float)*pDest_pre++ * (1.0f - t) + (float)*pDest_cur++ * t;
00271                 }
00272         }
00273 
00274         // Unlock the pixel buffer.
00275         pb->unlock();
00276         pb_pre->unlock();
00277         pb_cur->unlock();
00278 }
